title: Exclusive Amazing Race Sneak Peek: Team Texas Gets a Rude Awakening
content: The Amazing Race is putting its best foot forward in Season 27. On Friday's premiere (8/7c, CBS), the 11 new teams head to Rio de Janeiro and must compete in a favorite Brazilian pastime: beach foot volleyball. They get to use their hands, while the pros use their heads and feet, which has #TeamTexas' Tanner and Josh feeling a wee bit overconfident in the exclusive sneak peek above. Fall TV Popularity Contest: Vote for your favorite new shows Well, they're about to get a kick in the head. The Amazing Race returns Friday at 8/7c on CBS.
